blogPost.excerpt: The easiest way to build simple, powerful websites with nothing but Notion. Turn your Notion pages into fast, functional websites in minutes with free subdomain, custom google fonts, custom javascript code, pretty URLs, search engine optimization, and more.
blogPost.body: The easiest way to build simple, powerful websites with nothing but Notion. Turn your Notion pages into fast, functional websites in minutes with free subdomain, custom google fonts, custom javascript code, pretty URLs, search engine optimization, and more.
blogPost.title: Notion Dog  - Turn your Notion pages into websites in minutes
blogPost.author: 刘宇翔

localize.description: 最简单的方法来建立简单，强大的网站，但Notion。通过免费的子域名、自定义google字体、自定义javascript代码、漂亮的URL、搜索引擎优化等功能，在几分钟内将您的Notion页面变成快速、实用的网站。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内将您的Notion页面变成网站

localize.description: 最簡單的方法來建立簡單，強大的網站，但Notion。通過免費的子域名、自定義google字體、自定義javascript代碼、漂亮的URL、搜索引擎優化等功能，在幾分鐘內將您的Notion頁面變成快速、實用的網站。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內將您的Notion頁面變成網站

previous.excerpt: Collect signups and send SMS announcements when you're going live or launching something new. Send SMS campaigns for: 👂 Clubhouse rooms 🤩 IG Lives 🚀 Product launches 🔜 Merch or content drops 🎰 Your next thing Request an invite ➡️ norby.live ✨
previous.title: Drops by Norby - The easiest way to collect signups and send SMS campaigns

localize.tagline: 收集注册用户和发送短信活动的最简单方法

next.excerpt: Curvenote is a collaborative writing platform for scientists and engineers. Instantly integrate Jupyter outputs into customer reports, research papers, or internal documents, and see real-time comments and versions directly in Jupyter.
next.title: Curvenote - Write, share & remix ideas from Jupyter Notebooks

localize.description: Curvenote是一个科学家和工程师的协作写作平台。即时将Jupyter输出整合到客户报告、研究论文或内部文档中，并直接在Jupyter中查看实时评论和版本。
localize.tagline: 从Jupyter Notebooks中写下、分享和混音想法。

localize.description: Curvenote是一個科學家和工程師的協作寫作平臺。即時將Jupyter輸出整合到客戶報告、研究論文或內部文檔中，並直接在Jupyter中查看實時評論和版本。
localize.tagline: 從Jupyter Notebooks中寫下、分享和混音想法。
